author: Cherlynn Low
title: Engadget Podcast: Keeping fit with tech at home
description: We’re weeks into stay-at-home life, and some of us are atrophying. Devindra and Cherlynn have spent the last few weeks looking into how tech has enabled us to work, get medicine, see doctors, find sanity and sustain our mental health from home. This week, our…
